content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Walgreens has policies and procedures in place to guide and support team members in the compliant execution of their job responsibilities. These policies are available on our intranet site and you are expected to follow them.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We will cover general policy requirements in this course, but you are expected to review in detail the relevant requirements related to your job.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Supplemental training on these policies will be assigned to required positions.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"THE will cover the legal and compliance requirements for submission of claims to Federal health care program payors later in the Fraud, Waste, and Abuse section of this training. For now, letâ€™s examine our policies for dispensing prescription products.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":1490,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/25f40c8d-83e2-4c77-86a0-b5c1f5edf909/4.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/25f40c8d-83e2-4c77-86a0-b5c1f5edf909/4.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"4.PNG\",\"name\":\"4.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"25f40c8d-83e2-4c77-86a0-b5c1f5edf909\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":213,\"height\":88},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pharmacists\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":21766,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7c53eaf1-6539-4f14-8c77-aa79c8c8b13a/Picture3.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7c53eaf1-6539-4f14-8c77-aa79c8c8b13a/Picture3.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-left\",\"fileName\":\"Picture3.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture3.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7c53eaf1-6539-4f14-8c77-aa79c8c8b13a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":284,\"height\":183},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pharmacists may only dispense prescription products if a valid patient specific prescription is issued for a legitimate medical purpose by a prescriber acting in the usual course of his/her professional practice.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":1579,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e4df2532-5bf4-4b6a-a9fb-76d6871b7adc/5.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e4df2532-5bf4-4b6a-a9fb-76d6871b7adc/5.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"5.PNG\",\"name\":\"5.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"e4df2532-5bf4-4b6a-a9fb-76d6871b7adc\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":213,\"height\":89},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Walgreens Team Members\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":18478,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2257ed51-4f26-493c-b355-b1ccb1468667/Picture4.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2257ed51-4f26-493c-b355-b1ccb1468667/Picture4.jpg?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture4.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture4.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"2257ed51-4f26-493c-b355-b1ccb1468667\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":336,\"height\":154},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Walgreens team members and contractors providing Pharmacy Services must maintain a valid license, registration, or certification, including for Controlled Substances, to the extent required for the job function and by the legal requirements of each state where the Walgreens team member provides these services.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(Pharmacy Services are all activities associated with Walgreens Prescription Product Dispensing, Billing, and Collection services.)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":1600,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/effde716-370e-4187-ad0c-3e8152bb601a/6.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/effde716-370e-4187-ad0c-3e8152bb601a/6.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"6.PNG\",\"name\":\"6.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"effde716-370e-4187-ad0c-3e8152bb601a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":209,\"height\":87},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"More on Team Members\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":13893,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/41e98031-0deb-4a8b-9d87-c42ed0e4e424/Picture5.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/41e98031-0deb-4a8b-9d87-c42ed0e4e424/Picture5.jpg?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture5.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture5.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"41e98031-0deb-4a8b-9d87-c42ed0e4e424\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":323,\"height\":205},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In the event a Walgreens team memberâ€™s license, registration or certification is suspended, revoked or subject to disciplinary action and/or the team member becomes excluded, meaning they are ineligible to participate in federal or state health care programs, the team member must immediately report the event to their direct manager and the Compliance and Ethics Office at \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://wba.ethicspoint.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"wba.ethicspoint.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" If a team member is excluded they cannot do any work that is considered a Covered Function.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":1533,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/da70db96-1f95-4d69-b7f8-1b2b4b2ce42c/7.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/da70db96-1f95-4d69-b7f8-1b2b4b2ce42c/7.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"7.PNG\",\"name\":\"7.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"da70db96-1f95-4d69-b7f8-1b2b4b2ce42c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":215,\"height\":88},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pharmacy Services and Protecting Patientâ€™s Privacy\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":12781,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cd93eb1e-2929-4b9e-99d5-63823e651547/Picture6.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cd93eb1e-2929-4b9e-99d5-63823e651547/Picture6.jpg?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture6.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture6.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"cd93eb1e-2929-4b9e-99d5-63823e651547\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":428,\"height\":147},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All Walgreens team members that perform pharmacy services must protect patient privacy and the security of Protected Health Information (PHI). For more information about Walgreens policies and procedures for PHI, please refer to the Protecting Patient Information and Communication Policy.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Counseling\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In addition to dispensing prescriptions, only a Walgreens pharmacist (or pharmacy intern under the direct supervision of a pharmacist if permitted by state requirements) can provide patient counseling.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Prior Authorization\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Team members must not manipulate claims data to obtain insurance coverage for a prescription or approval of a prior authorization. For prior authorizations specifically, if one is pending, IntercomPlus will automatically resubmit the prescription daily to determine the approval status of the claim.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When community-based specialty and approved retail locations are engaging in activities related to the prior authorization process, Walgreens team members must always represent themselves as Walgreens personnel, not as the patient, patientâ€™s authorized representative, or a health care providerâ€™s staff member. In addition, Walgreens personnel cannot complete clinical information or any other sections justifying the medical necessity of the prescription in order to obtain approval of a prior authorization.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Team members must carefully review the policy to understand what activities related to prior authorizations are permissible to engage in and by whom, as not all pharmacies may provide the same level of assistance relating to prior authorizations.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Point of Sale Policies\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-warning\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We have covered the policies and procedures ensuring compliance with requirements for pharmacy dispensing, counseling, and prior authorization. Now, letâ€™s examine point of sale policies that you are required to abide by.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Patient Financial Assistance\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The cost of prescription drugs and managing out of pocket expenses can be a challenge for some patients. However, Walgreens Team Members must be aware of the rules we must follow regarding financial assistance programs. Generally speaking, Walgreens cannot accept a manufacturerâ€™s co-pay card for patients that are enrolled in a Federal health care programâ€”this includes managed Medicaid programs operated by a private managed care organization/payor.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Walgreens Team Members are prohibited from proactively promoting manufacturer co-pay savings card programs to patients. Walgreens Team Members may accept manufacturer- issued savings cards from eligible patients when they provide a hardcopy of the manufacturer- issued savings card or an electronic version of the manufacturer-issued savings card with the activation completed by the patient. When accepting manufacturer-issued savings cards, Walgreens Team Members must ensure the patient has consented to (i) receiving marketing information directly from the manufacturer; (ii) being asked to provide personal information to the manufacturer; and (iii) the sharing of certain information with the manufacturer.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Walgreens Team Members may only process cash discount cards if presented by the patient and must never promote or assist a patient in the enrollment of a cash discount card. In addition, Team Members are prohibited from receiving any financial incentives, compensation or any other form of value for distributing, enrolling patients in or processing third-party discount cards.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Walgreens Team Members must collect the cost sharing amounts that are returned from the health plan from all patients unless they are a Medicaid beneficiary and the Medicaid plan exempts the beneficiary from the cost sharing obligation. Team members must never personally pay the out of pocket obligations for a Patient (unless they are paying for their own out of pocket costs or acting as a Patient Representative).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Prescription Delivery\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Delivery of prescription and OTC products is permissible at the patientâ€™s request for eligible patients if certain conditions are met as outlined in the Prescription Delivery policy. It is imperative that a pharmacy holds a valid non-resident license in the state where the prescription order is being shipped. Team members must ensure proper proof of delivery is obtained according to the policy.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Preparation and Submission of Health Care Claims\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Walgreens Team Members must prepare and submit claims for reimbursement that are complete, accurate, and comply with relevant third party payor requirements.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Walgreens team members are prohibited from knowingly submitting false, fraudulent, or inaccurate claims information.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Team members must follow all policies, procedures and job aids when submitting claims (e.g., targeted good faith dispensing, how to process partial fills and out of stock prescriptions).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All claims submitted to a third party payor for a prescription product that has been filled but not dispensed to the patient within the timeframe specified in the Return to Stock Policy must be deleted in order to reverse the claim in alignment with the Health Care Claims policy. It is important that pharmacy team members complete the daily Aged-RX Report and weekly Bin Reconciliation tasks to avoid billing third party payors for prescriptions that are not picked up and sold to patients.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Medicare Part B Policy Requirements\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Walgreens Team Members must initiate the process for submitting a claim to Medicare Part B for a prescription product if requested by a Medicare Part B patient.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Team members must always follow the documentation requirements as outlined in the Medicare Part B Pharmacy Requirements Policy.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As an example, signed proof of delivery must be obtained for all prescription products dispensed to Part B beneficiaries, excluding prescriptions shipped via a common carrier (e.g. FedEx).\\\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Overpayments Policy\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Walgreens team members must immediately report to the Compliance Office any potential billing or payment errors not corrected in the normal course of business procedures.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Company must resolve any reported billing or payment errors, including reporting and refunding any Identified Overpayments to third party payors in accordance with the Walgreens Overpayments Policy.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Exclusion screening polices\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As you have discovered, dispensing, counseling, prior authorizations, delivery, patient financial assistance, and billing activities have their own policies and procedures. So does Exclusion screening.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Walgreens screens its employees to ensure they are eligible to participate in federal health care programs upon hire and on an ongoing monthly basis. Third parties and contractors that are deemed Covered Persons are also subject to the screening requirements.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If for any reason, you become ineligible to participate in one or more government health care programs, you must disclose this immediately to your direct manager and the Compliance and Ethics Office.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Any Walgreens team member that appears on any exclusion, suspension, or debarment list or is otherwise ineligible to participate in one or more government health care programs will be suspended pending further review and may be subject to further disciplinary actions, up to and including termination, if the ineligibility is confirmed.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
